string-array.name: question_3_wrong_answers
string-array.item: Always start observables on the main thread
Never start observables on the main thread

string-array.name: question_5_wrong_answers
string-array.item: flatMap returns a non-observable object while map returns an observable
flatMap processes items asynchronously while map processes them synchronously
map processes items asynchronously while flatMap processes them synchronously

string-array.name: question_8_wrong_answers
string-array.item: The time of the day you code in Assembly
The time RxJava forces you to code in Assembly

string-array.name: question_9_wrong_answers
string-array.item: RxJava handles it for you and prints a proper stack trace when an error occurs
